exceptions.tactic: intros Q p1 p2 H1 H2 r H3 H4.

original: intros Q p1 p2 H1 H2 r H3 H4. destruct H1. - exists p1. split. + auto. + apply Rstar_0. auto. - destruct H3 as [p3 [H5 [H6 H7]]]. destruct H4 as [p4 [H8 [H9 H10]]]. exists p3. split. + auto. + eapply Rstar_n. * eauto. * apply H5.
